name: Color Maze
description:
Color Maze is a 3d top-down game made in 48(not really, i had sleep and breaks^^) hours for the Ludum Dare Compo #32, with Unity. Your goal is to get to the end of a level using two different kinds of ammunition you can collect. They are red and blue and can destroy walls of the same color. There is a bug after you completed the game, but i figured it would be cheating to remove it afterwards;)

I haven't really coded before and it was my first time using c#(i'm a 3d artist usually) Hope you will have fun trying it out :)
